MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ CustomDeadLetterQueue { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 URI，该 URI 包含每个应用程序的死信队列（该队列用于放置已过期的消息以及传输或传递失败的消息）的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that contains the location of the per-application dead-letter queue, where messages that have expired or that have failed transfer or delivery are placed.

value.span: 一个 ，包含每个应用程序的死信队列的位置。

span.span: The that contains the location of the per-application dead-letter queue.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 死信队列是发送应用程序的队列管理器中的一个队列，用于放置传递失败的过期消息。The dead-letter queue is a queue on the queue manager of the sending application for expired messages that have failed to be delivered. 指定的 URI 必须使用 Net.msmq 方案。The URI that is specified by must use the Net.msmq scheme. 如果 设置为 或 ，则 必须设置为 `null`。If is set to or , then must be set to `null`. 如果 不为 `null`，则 必须设置为 。If is not `null`, then must be set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue DeadLetterQueue { System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指示要使用的死信队列的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the type of dead-letter queue to use.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指示要使用的死信队列的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the type of dead-letter queue to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 死信队列是发送应用程序的队列管理器中的一个队列，用于放置传递失败的过期消息。The dead-letter queue is a queue on the queue manager of the sending application for expired messages that have failed to be delivered. 死信队列枚举指定要使用的死信队列的类型。The dead-letter queue enumeration specifies the type of dead-letter queue to use. 该属性的值有：The values are: - None：不需要死信队列。None: If no dead-letter queue is required. 因此，如果消息传递失败，则不会在死信队列中保留它的任何记录。Thus, if a message were to fail delivery, no record of it would be maintained in the dead-letter queue. 这是当 设置为 `false` 时的默认值。This is the default value when is set to `false`. - System：系统级死信队列用于记录传递失败的消息。System: The system-wide dead-letter queue would be used to record messages that fail delivery. 消息队列（也称为 MSMQ）具有一个事务性系统死信队列和一个非事务性系统死信队列，分别记录来自事务性队列和非事务性队列的传递失败的消息。Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ) has a transactional system dead-letter queue and a nontransactional system dead-letter queue to record messages that failed delivery from transactional and nontransactional queues, respectively. 这是当 设置为 `true` 时的默认值。This is the default value when is set to `true`. - Custom： 中指定的队列用于记录传递失败的消息。Custom: The queue specified in the is used to record messages that fail delivery. 造成消息未能到达接收应用程序的原因包括：The reasons that a message can fail to reach the receiving application include: - 事务性消息被发送到非事务性队列中。A transactional message is sent to a nontransactional queue. - 非事务性消息被发送到事务性队列中。A nontransactional message is sent to a transactional queue. - 未经身份验证的消息被发送到仅接受经过身份验证的消息的队列中。An unauthenticated message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages. - 未加密的消息被发送到仅接受加密消息的队列中。An unencrypted message is sent to a queue that accepts only encrypted messages. - 消息在传递给接收方之前过期。The message expires before the message is delivered to a receiver. - 超出了目标计算机的消息存储配额或目标队列的存储配额，或者在消息到达时目标计算机上没有可用的存储空间。The message storage quota of the target computer or the storage quota of the destination queue is exceeded, or there is no available storage space on the target computer when the message arrives. - 发送方没有将消息放入目标队列所需的访问权限（可能为英文网页）。The sender does not have the access rights needed to place the message in the destination queue. - 附加在消息上的数字签名无效。The digital signature attached to the message is not valid. - 加密的消息不能由目标队列管理器解密。An encrypted message cannot be decrypted by the destination queue manager. - 目标队列在检索消息之前被清除或删除。The destination queue is purged or deleted before the message is retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Durable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定此绑定处理的消息是持久的还是可变的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the messages processed by this binding are durable or volatile.

value.span: 如果此绑定处理的消息是持久的，则为 ；如果这些消息是可变的，则为 。

span.span: if the messages processed by this binding are durable; if they are volatile.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持久消息能够在队列管理器崩溃后保留下来，而可变消息则不能。A durable message survives a queue manager crash, while a volatile message does not. 当应用程序可以容忍偶尔丢失消息时，可变消息是有用的。Volatile messages are useful when applications can tolerate occasional lost messages. 如果 设置为 `true`，则消息必须为持久的。If is set to `true`, the messages must be durable.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExactlyOnce { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示此绑定处理的消息是否将只接收一次。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether messages processed by this binding will be received exactly once.

value.span: 如果此绑定处理的消息将只接收一次，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages processed by this binding will be received exactly once; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送的消息可以包含保证，也可以不包含保证。A message can be sent with or without assurances. 应用程序可以使用保证来确保发送的消息到达接收消息队列；如果消息未能到达，则应用程序可以通过读取死信队列进行确定。An assurance enables an application to ensure that a sent message reached the receiving message queue, or if it did not, the application can determine this by reading the dead-letter queue. 将 设置为 `true` 时发送的消息必须只发送到事务性队列。Messages sent with set to `true` must be sent only to a transactional queue. 当设置为`true`，该值指示消息队列 (也称为 MSMQ) 将会确保将发送的消息传递到接收的消息队列一次且只有一次，并且如果传递失败，将消息发送到死信队列。, when set to `true`, indicates that Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ) will ensure that a sent message is delivered to the receiving message queue once and only once, and if delivery fails, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 对于要求将 设置为 `false` 的消息， 属性默认为 `null`。For messages that require to be `false`, the property defaults to `null`. 对于需要消息要`true`、属性默认为事务性系统级死信队列在消息队列中。For messages that require to be `true`, the property defaults to a transactional system-wide dead-letter queue in Message Queuing.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void InitializeFrom(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement) cil managed

param.name: bindingElement
param.span: 一个绑定元素，包含用于初始化此绑定元素的设置。

span.span: A binding element that contains the settings to be used to initialize this binding element.

summary.span: 使用指定绑定元素的内容初始化此绑定元素。

span.span: Initializes this binding element with the content from the specified binding element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRetryCycles { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置尝试向接收应用程序传递消息的最大重试周期数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry cycles to attempt delivery of messages to the receiving application.

value.span: 一个整数，指示尝试向接收应用程序传递消息的最大重试周期数。

span.span: An integer that indicates the maximum number of retry cycles to attempt delivery of messages to the application.

value.span: 默认值为 2。

span.span: The default value is 2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个重试周期按指定次数尝试向应用程序传递消息。A single retry cycle attempts to deliver a message to an application a specified number of times. 尝试次数由 属性设置。The number of attempts made is set by the property. 如果在耗尽传递尝试次数后，应用程序仍未能处理消息，则将消息发送到重试队列。If the application fails to consume the message after the attempts at delivery have been exhausted, the message is sent to a retry queue. 后续的重试周期包括在经过由 属性指定的延迟后，从重试队列返回应用程序队列以再次尝试传递给接收应用程序的消息。Subsequent retry cycles consist of the message being returned from the retry queue to the application queue to attempt delivery to the application again, after a delay specified by the property. 属性指定应用程序用于尝试传递消息的重试周期数。The property specifies the number of retry cycles that the application uses to attempt to deliver the message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MsmqTransportSecurity As MsmqTransportSecurityElement

summary.span: 获取一个 实例，该实例封装绑定的传输安全设置。

span.span: Gets an instance that encapsulates the transport security settings for a binding.

value.span: 一个 实例，该实例封装绑定的传输安全设置。

span.span: An instance that encapsulates the transport security settings for a binding.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 实例，该实例包含一个 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 对象。

span.span: Gets a instance that contains a collection of objects that can be attributes or objects of this configuration element.

value.span: 一个 实例，该实例包含一个 对象集合，这些对象可以是此绑定配置元素的特性或 对象。

span.span: A instance that contains a collection of objects that can be attributes or objects of this binding configuration element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReceiveContextEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否启用接收上下文来处理队列中的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if receive context for processing messages in queues is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用接收上下文来处理队列中的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if receive context for processing messages in queues is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是当`true`，服务可以"扫视"队列的消息以开始处理它，并发生任何错误并且引发异常，如果其保留在队列。When this is `true`, a service can "peek" a message on the queue to begin processing it, and, if anything goes wrong and an exception is thrown, it remains on the queue. 服务还可"锁定"消息以便重试时间以后处理。Services can also "lock" messages in order to retry processing at a later point in time. ReceiveContext 提供了一种机制来"完成"的消息一次处理，因此可以从队列中移除。ReceiveContext provides a mechanism for "completing" the message once processed so it can be removed from the queue. 在处理期间，将不再通过网络读取消息并将其重写到队列中，而且各个消息不会在不同的服务实例之间传来传去。Messages are no longer being read and re-written to queues over the network, and individual messages aren’t bouncing across different service instances during processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling ReceiveErrorHandling { System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指定如何处理病毒消息和不可调度的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specifies how poison and nondispatchable messages are handled.

value.span: 一个 值，指定如何处理病毒消息和不可调度的消息。

span.span: A value that specifies how poison and nondispatchable messages are handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为 时，通道侦听器会出错，并且会跟踪和引发一个 （它包装一个 ）。When this property is set to , the channel listener is faulted and a (wrapping a ) is traced and thrown. 有问题的消息会留在队列中，并且需要通过某种手动方法移除。The offending message is left in the queue and needs to be removed by some manual method. 包含一个 ，它可用于标识有问题的消息并将其从病毒消息队列中手动移除。The contains a that can be used to identify and manually remove the offending message from the poison-message queue. 当此属性设置为 时，只是丢弃有问题的消息。When this property is set to , the offending message is simply dropped. 当此属性设置为 时，会将一个否定确认发送到客户端，并从病毒消息队列中移除有问题的消息。When this property is set to , a negative acknowledgment is sent to the client and the offending message is removed from the poison-message queue. 此选项仅在消息队列（也称为 MSMQ）4.0 中可用。This option is available only on Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ) 4.0. 当设置为 时，会将有问题的消息移动到最后一个病毒子队列。When set to , the offending message is moved to the final poison subqueue. 此选项仅在“消息队列 4.0”(Message Queuing 4.0) 中可用。This option is available only on Message Queuing 4.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReceiveRetryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置队列管理器在将消息传输到重试队列前可尝试发送该消息的最大次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times that the queue manager should attempt to send a message before transferring it to the retry queue.

value.span: 一个 32 位有符号整数，它指定队列管理器在将消息传输到重试队列前可尝试发送该消息的最大次数。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer that specifies the maximum number of times that the queue manager should attempt to send a message before transferring it to the retry queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果达到尝试传递的最大次数且应用程序仍未处理消息，则会将消息发送到重试队列，以便在将来某个时刻重新进行传递。If the maximum number of delivery attempts is reached and the message is not consumed by the application, then the message is sent to a retry queue for redelivery at some later point in time. 将消息传输回发送队列之前的时间量由 控制。The amount of time before the message is transferred back to the sending queue is controlled by . 如果重试周期达到 值，则或者将消息发送到病毒消息队列，或者将否定确认发送回发送方。If retry cycles reach the value, then either the message is sent to the poison-message queue, or a negative acknowledgment is sent back to the sender. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan RetryCycleDelay { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示尝试传递无法立即传递的消息时，各个重试周期之间的时间延迟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time delay between retry cycles when attempting to deliver a message that could not be delivered immediately.

value.span: 一个 ，指定在开始下一个尝试传递到接收应用程序的周期前等待的时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time to wait before starting the next cycle of delivery attempts to the receiving application.
The default value is "00:10:00".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个重试周期尝试按指定次数向接收应用程序传递消息。A single retry cycle attempts to deliver a message to a receiving application a specified number of times. 尝试次数由 属性指定。The number of attempts made is specified by the property. 如果在连续重试了指定次数后，应用程序仍未能处理消息，则将消息发送到重试队列。If the application fails to consume the message after the specified number of immediate retries, the message is sent to a retry queue. 后续的重试周期包括在经过由 属性指定的延迟后，从重试队列返回应用程序队列以再次尝试传递给接收应用程序的消息。Subsequent retry cycles consist of the message being returned from the retry queue to the application queue to attempt delivery to the application again, after a delay specified by the property. 重试周期数由属性。The number of retry cycles is specified by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToLive { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个时间间隔，该时间间隔指示此绑定处理的消息在过期之前可以保留在队列中的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of time that indicates how long the messages processed by this binding can be in the queue before they expire.

value.span: ，指示消息在过期之前可以保留在队列中的时间长度。

span.span: The that indicates how long the messages can be in the queue before they expire.
The default value is one day (01:00:00:00).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性可以确保具有时效性的消息不会在由接收应用程序进行处理之前过时。The property is set to ensure that time-sensitive messages do not become stale before they are processed by the receiving applications. 如果队列中的消息在指定时间间隔内未被接收应用程序进行处理，则称该消息为过时消息。A message in a queue that is not consumed by the receiving application within the time interval specified is said to be expired. 过期消息将发送到一个称为死信队列的特殊队列中。Expired messages are sent to a special queue called the dead-letter queue. 死信队列的位置通过 属性进行设置，或基于保证设置为适当的默认值。The location of the dead-letter queue is set with the property or to the appropriate default, based on assurances.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMsmqTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应跟踪由此绑定处理的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether messages processed by this binding should be traced.

value.span: 如果应跟踪由此绑定处理的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages processed by this binding should be traced; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用跟踪，则每当消息离开或到达运行消息队列（也称为 MSMQ）的计算机时，都会创建报告消息并将其发送到报告队列。When tracing is enabled, report messages are created and sent to the report queue each time the message leaves or arrives at a computer running Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSourceJournal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应将由此绑定处理的消息的副本存储在源日志队列中。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether copies of messages processed by this binding should be stored in the source journal queue.

value.span: 如果应将此绑定处理的消息副本存储在源日记队列中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if copies of messages processed by this binding should be stored in the source journal queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果排队应用程序必须保留已离开计算机传出队列的消息的记录，则可以将这些消息复制到日志队列。Queued applications that must keep a record of messages that have left the computer's outgoing queue can copy the messages to a journal queue. 在消息离开传出队列，并且接收到目标计算机已接收该消息的确认后，该消息的副本就会保留在发送计算机的系统日志队列中。Once a message leaves the outgoing queue and an acknowledgment is received that the message was received on the destination computer, a copy of the message is kept in the sending computer's system journal queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ValidityDuration { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在使用排队通道时的连接超时。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies a connection time-out when used with queued channels.

value.span: 与排队通道一起使用时，连接超时。

span.span: A connection time-out when used with queued channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 当 对某一消息过期时，如果过期是在事务处理期间发生的，则会随工作流实例一起中止用于其处理的任何事务。If expires for a message, any transaction that may be used for its processing will be aborted along with the workflow instance if the expiration occurs during the transaction.
